[i]Magecraft[/i] – Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 green Druid creature token.
[i]Formidable[/i] – Instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard has escape {G}{U}{R}, exile three other cards from your graveyard, as long as creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
{G}{U}{R}: Transform Garnet. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
rules_text2:
[i]Ferocious[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, mill three. Put a land card milled this way onto the battlefield tapped. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may put a creature card in your graveyard into your hand.
{RG}{UR}:Transform Faerina Attuning. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
